name: Evolve From Fear EFF
description:
You find yourself in a madhouse. By evolving to different creatures to reach the final evacuation point. Be careful! There are lots of enemies and they have also experienced some evaluations.

Good Luck on the way!

Members: 
Ilkin Mammadzada (Game developer)
Bartu Saripinarli (Technical Artist)
Mehmet Mucahit Dogan (Character Artist)
Abdulsamed Unal (Environment Artist)
Abdurrahman Asker (Rigger Animator)
Note: All assets are done by artists.
Controls: WASD -> Move, 1,2,3,4 -> Evaluation, Left Click -> Attack

Credits: 
Background Music : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AfXSQwQzjSY Kevin MacLeod
Package: DOTween Pro
